name: window-commands
description: A GNOME extension and CLI for window management commands

scripts.install: npm install --prefix extension && npm install --prefix cli
scripts.build: npm run build:extension && npm run copy-metadata-to-cli && npm run build:cli && npm run copy-outputs
scripts.copy-metadata-to-cli: cp extension/dist/commandMetadata.js cli/src/ && cp extension/dist/commandMetadata.d.ts cli/src/
scripts.copy-outputs: mkdir -p dist && cp extension/dist/extension.js dist/ && cp cli/dist/cli.js dist/ && chmod +x dist/cli.js && cp metadata.json dist/
scripts.lint: npm run lint:extension && npm run lint:cli
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist extension/dist cli/dist extension/node_modules cli/node_modules node_modules
